meanings: (자리에서) get up, stand up, (formal) rise (up / to one's feet); (누워 있다가 앉다) sit up; (넘어졌다가) pick oneself up; (자리...
(잠자리에서) get up, get out of bed, (formal) rise; (잠에서 깨다) wake up, (literary) awake
occur, (일·사건 등이) happen, take place, come up, arise; (우연히) come about; (전쟁·싸움 등이) break out, erupt
